\_quarto.yml

```{yaml}
#| code-line-numbers: "7-17"
project:
  type: manuscript

manuscript:
  article: index.qmd

format:
  html:
    format-links: [pdf, docx]
  docx: default
  jats: default
  pdf: 
    output-file: "idk"
  agu-pdf:
    output-file: "agu"
  jasa-pdf:
    output-file: "jasa"
```
